issue.message: This call is to a method from API 29, the call containing class androidx.compose.ui.graphics.AndroidPaintKt is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 29. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(29) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(29).

This call is to a method from API 29, the call containing class androidx.compose.ui.graphics.CanvasUtils is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 29. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(29) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(29).

This call is to a method from API 29, the call containing class androidx.compose.ui.graphics.CanvasUtils is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 29. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(29) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(29).
